title: Litter containers
context: [ยง339-6] Litter containers. Litter receptacles shall be suitably located along the public highways of the State, public places, beaches and bathing areas. The number of such receptacles and the duty to provide receptacles and to dispose of litter from the receptacles shall be established by the rules adopted pursuant to section 339-2(a). [L Sp 1977 1st, c 2, pt of ยง2]
